original: @128b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te phyag gsum byas na sde snod gsum bros  pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgoms pa'i bsod @129a *//
analyzed: @128b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo // dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te phyag gsum byas na sde snod gsum bros  pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgoms pa'i bsod @129a *//

translated: If one prostrates three times while reciting this mantra once for each prostration to the representations of the Three Jewels, one will equal the merit of reciting and contemplating the Three Baskets.

original: nyi ma re re phyag gsum gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong pa'i lam gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyi ma re re phyag gsum gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong pa'i lam gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one prostrates three times each day, in this very life one will attain the meditative absorption of the wisdom of the path of seeing.

original: de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'byung po dang / nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'byung po dang / nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Until one attains that, one will not be harmed by humans, non-humans, spirits, or epidemics.

original: aom na mo manydzu shri ye /🔽na ma: su shri ye /
analyzed: aom na mo manydzu shri ye / na ma: su shri ye /
translated: Oṃ. Homage to Mañjuśrī!🔽Homage to Suśrī!

original: na ma aatta ma shri ye sv'ah'a /
analyzed: na ma aatta ma shri ye sv'ah'a /

original: phyag bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: phyag bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The dhāraṇī of prostration is complete.
